name: 24/7 Crisis Hotline
description: Individual counseling, support groups, & referrals for survivors of traumatic events and their families are offered. Advocacy and support services are also available to all ages, 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. 24/7 crisis & support hotline for an initial screening: For Adults, call 1-877-503-1850. for Teens 1-877-923-0700.

whatTheyOffer: Individual counseling, support groups, & referrals for survivors of domestic violence and their families are offered.
